column4: so question: i reformatted my laptop dv6700 hp pavilion to 9.10 and now the speakers are makeing this popping sound even when sound is muted...help?
I just reformatted my laptop from 8.10 to 9.10 and now the speakers are makeing a popping sound, even when the spekaers are muted
if no one here can help me
can someone direct me to somewhere that can
what's your question? i missed it
i just switched from ibex to koala and now speakers are makeing a popping sound even when muted
have you fully updated ? "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade" ?
ok, reboot and let me know if your update fixed it
fully updated fully upgraded and rebooted, the popping sound still persists
